item.title: Tom Lee says ‘back up the truck’ after Wednesday’s panic selling
item.description: In a Wednesday note, Fundstrat Global Advisors' Tom Lee predicted the 'panicked reaction' would prove 'short lived.'

item.title: Europe stocks suffer worst session for five weeks after Fed outlook; Bank of England holds rates
item.description: European markets fell sharply on Thursday after the U.S. Federal Reserve indicated that fewer rates cuts are on the horizon.

item.title: Trump joins Elon Musk in opposing House GOP's government funding bill
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump came out against a government funding bill backed by Republican House Speaker Mike Johnson.

item.title: GA appeals court disqualifies DA Fani Willis from Trump election case, lets indictment stand
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump and others are charged in Georgia with crimes related to efforts to overturn his 2020 election loss to President Joe Bide...

item.title: Wall Street has mixed feelings toward European stocks for 2025. Here are their big calls
item.description: While some banks are bearish, and expect a decline, others are forecasting high single digit gains for the Stoxx Europe 600 index.
